body.name: Tkisko Projector with Wifi and Bluetooth, 700 ANSI Full HD 1080P Projector 4K Supported, Portable Outdoor Movie Projector, 4D/4P Keystone & 50%-100% Zoom, Smart Projector for Phone/PC/TV Stick
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 23 mins
features: 🌟【Super Bright Used in the Daytime】Based on our customers' requiremnts, we have upgraded our projector in this aspect of brighness in 2024. Tkisko (TO1) projector has truly full HD 1080p resolution with 700 ANSI brightness andhigher contrast ratio of 20000:1, which delivers much higher brightness and more vivid images than those projectors in the market. Enjoying a true theater experience at home with this newest 4K projector!

🔶【50%-100% Zoom & 4D/4P Keystone】With the zoom function, the image size can be reduced from 100% to 50% without having to move this smart projector. The adjustable 40”-300” screen also gives you the freedom to customize your projection screen size to fit any space. 4D/4P correction function allows the adjustment of all four corners to achieve a square rectangular image.

🛜【Newest Wifi Projector with Speaker for 2024】Built- in advanced 5G+2.4G technology, You use this 5g wifi bluetooth projector to watch all kinds of videos or playing games with fast and low-latency transmission. and the inner speaker is enough to enjoy the clear voice, no need of extra voice speaker. Enjoy a smooth viewing and gaming experience with this wireless projector.

✅【Bidirectional Bluetooth Connection】TO1 bluetooth projector has its own speaker, which can be an independant speaker through bluetooth connection; you can listen music or books without mirroring; In addition, it still allows for easy pairing between the phone projector and your own speaker if you would like.

💯【Multimedia Connectivity 】This portable projector is compatible with many inputs and devices, including built-in HDMI/USB/AV/3.5mm audio jack.The fully sealed optical engine protects the lens of projector from dust and scratches, ensuring a longer lifetime of use. 🎁Bonus with the backpack makes you take this outdoor projector anywhere. ❤️: Enjoy peace of mind with Tkisko's friendly customer support and 3-year warranty. Any issue you encounter, we are ready to help you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Tkisko TO1 4K projector with wifi and bluetooth? Do you want to enjoy gaming or movie on a larger screen? do you want to catch all the wonderful moments during the World Cup on a larger screen?or do you feel sore in your eyes while watching videos on your phone and iPad? Consider choosing Tkisko TO1 movie projector for outdoor&indoor use! With Native 1080P, 20000:1 contrast ratio, and a brightness rating of 20000 lumens, Tkisko TO1 outdoor movie projector offers brighter, clearer, and more vivid pictures.Our portable projector equipped with a high-quality and friendly LED lamp, which have a long lifespan, and protect the elderly and children's eyesight.5.1 bi-directional Bluetooth Connection--Tkisko bluetooth projector adopts the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chip, it can connect to Bluetooth speaker wireless but also can connect to a phone as a speaker.Utral large 300'' Display --Feel like at a cinema and enjoy a visual feast with your famliy and friends!Connectivity Technology--WiFi/Bluetooth/USB/HDMI/Smartphone/Laptop/Tablet/AV/3.5mm Audio/TV Stick.Equipped with multiple ports, which can be easily connected to DVD players, smartphones, tablets, HDMI-enabled devices, wired headsets, Bluetooth speakers, etc. Easily meet your daily, party, and game needs. Product Specifications： Resolution: Native 1920 x 1080P, 4K supportBrightness: 700ANSI, 20000LContrast ratio: 20000:1Projection Size: 50''-300''LED life: 100,000 hoursWireless function: Bluetooth & WiFi

Native 1080P projector designed with the latest NTSC color technology with 20000L brightness and has improved the color contrast ratio to 20000:1 to restore the real color content, which presents you with a real, dynamic, and color-vibrant projection image quality, provide you with a clearer and sharper visual feast.Warm Tip: Tkisko TO1 4K Projector can projection both day light and night , but it will perform the best effect in a dark environment.

TO1 outdoor projector is equipped with 4D/4P keystone correction for the best image, making screen adjustment more accurate and freer. 4D/4P correction function allows the adjustment of all four corners to achieve a square rectangular image. Simply press the keystone correction button on the remote control and place the projector in any position without worrying about distorted images.With the 50% Zoom function, our smart projector can reduce the image size to 50% without moving.

Experience the smoother online video streaming and more stable transmission with the Tkisko TO1 WiFi Bluetooth projector! Our 5g wifi bluetooth projector supports both 2.4G and 5G dual-band WiFi connections, allowing you to choose the channel that best fits your family's needs. 2.4G WiFi offers a further range through blocked walls, while 5G WiFi provides a more stable network speed.Our TO1 projector with wifi and bluetooth support both wireless and wired screen mirroring. Wireless projection is easy to operate and eliminates space and cable limitations, allowing you to enjoy the big screen in minutes. Even without WiFi, you can still mirror your display outdoors with the TO1 phone projector through wired projecton, our user manual provides detailed instructions (original HDMI cable required).Please note that due to copyright restrictions, certain platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Disney+ do not allow mirror display. But don't worry! You can still use a TV stick with the projector to enjoy these videos.

Elevate your home theater experience with Tkisko TO1 smart projector! Tkisko TO1 bluetooth projector features the latest bi-directional Bluetooth 5.1 technology, which allows it to be used as a stand-alone Bluetooth stereo or connect to external audio devices,making it perfect for movie nights, gaming, and music.Featuring a built-in 12W powerful HIFI speaker, The TO1 projector provides powerful and clear audio, offering a true surround sound experience for movies, games, and music.Connect to various Bluetooth speakers and headphones, enjoying excellent sound quality and louder sound without the need for a wired external speaker.

300" Large Screen Tkisko outdoor projector provides a maximum 300-inch display, brilliant big-screen visual experience accessible.By adjusting the distance between the projector and the screen, you can get the image size that works best for you.The recommended projection distance at home is 9-10 ft with 80-90 inches screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I did some research trying to find a great projector for indoor use. This one is portable, great quality, and very user friendly, and most important it is not as expensive as XGIMI. It came in with a nice storage bag. I'm extremely pleased with the brightness of the screen even with moderate light in the room. You just simply place this projector within a few inches of the wall (no need to mount it on a ceiling) and after a few adjustments you are set to enjoy your content. I have been using it for several days and it works perfectly. Overall, very happy with the purchase and would recommend to anyone looking for a great portable projector!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a very good projector. Easy to connect to WIFI and easy to cast from many devices. It displays very clear pictures and videos on my wall which has many bubbles. The built-in sound system is also good. You don't need additional speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd one i bought, my friend took my first one when he visited me. We watched movie together with the projector, he liked it too. This one works very well as usual, same functions, many ways to connect, such as HDMI, Bluetooth, USB, WiFi. Picture quality is good, very good quality control., i would recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: Good projector but needs to be completely dark for best picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Video Projector in high quality - Very good experience!
reviews.reviewText: Great experience!!! I would give this product 5 out of 5 rating. From the perspective of portability, quality of materials, remote control, picture quality, and brightness, it seamlessly meets my requirements for a video projector. Within a realistic expectation, this is definitely a great projector to buy from Amazon as it offered me $50 off discount.The instruction in English version was clear. So far I have been using this device for multiple times and it still works perfectly with mirroring my iPhone, Laptop, and iPad. Totally worth every penny.The picture space size is adjustable using remote control so it fit in my bedroom. The picture quality is even better than the old television I’ve been used. Super love this product which improves my quality of life!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars save the money and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product a few days ago. My house is not very big, so space is limited. I was in the market for a television, but since this was so much less expensive and more of a space saver, I elected to pick this up. This projector is also very simple to operate and can be connected to iphone or ipad，which is useful。Even with my living room light on, I can still see the picture, although, I would recommend VERY minimal lighting. The speakers are ok. At maximum volume I'm able to hear it over my old fashion furnace. The picture size is perfect for no bigger than my living room is. I plan on buying one more for my bedroom at some point. The picture quality is better than any television I've ever seen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I like this projector very much. Its operation is very convenient, you only need to connect the power supply, connect HDMI to the computer and you can watch it. The 1080p definition is great, I put it in the living room and the image is very clear on the wall. The sound quality of the projector itself is good, and there is no need for additional speakers. If you have the pursuit of sound quality, you can also connect your favorite speakers. It also comes with a bag to put down the projector and various data cables. It is very convenient when going out camping, highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the best projector at this price level
reviews.reviewText: I have owned a project at a similar price for more than a year and I don't like its performance so I bought this one. This is far superior in all directions. I couldn't be happier.I am writing this review after over 10 days of intensive using this projector, including video gaming and Netflix streaming in my living room.Pros:1. Bright enough to use during the day. Brightness is important to me and this projector didn't let me down. It seems brighter than my previous so-called "800 lumens projector".2. Projected images are pleasing to the eyes and texts are sharp.3. Varias connection options. Besides wifi and Bluetooth connections, there are also 2 HDMI ports available. I can have my pc and switch connected to it all the time.4. Easy keystone correction. One-step to operate and allows a large adjustment range.Cons:1. The power cord is short.2. The remote is directional, which means I have to point the remote to the project for remote control.
